meanings.definition: A distance longer than the standard marathon distance of 26.2 miles.
meanings.sent1: Completing an ultradistance race requires great endurance and determination.
meanings.sent2: Many athletes challenge themselves by participating in ultradistance events.
meanings.sent3: Why did the snail decide to attempt an ultradistance race? To prove slow and steady wins the race!
meanings.sent4: The ultradistance between the two cities seemed to stretch on forever, like an endless road.
meanings.sent5: The ultradistance race felt like a never-ending journey through the countryside.

meanings.definition: The act of running or participating in races that are longer than traditional marathon distances.
meanings.sent1: Her passion for ultradistance running led her to explore new challenges.
meanings.sent2: Ultradistance events attract dedicated athletes seeking to push their limits.
meanings.sent3: Why did the cheetah sign up for the ultradistance race? To show it's not just about speed, but endurance too!
meanings.sent4: In the ultradistance of life, sometimes the greatest victories come from enduring the longest races.
meanings.sent5: The ultradistance competition demanded both physical and mental strength from all participants.
